mapper.update: update FLOOR_MAN set BUILD_NO = #{BUILD_NO}, FLOOR = #{FLOOR}, FLOOR_MASTER_NAME = #{FLOOR_MASTER_NAME}, MASTER_TEL = #{MASTER_TEL}, CREATE_TIME = now(), FLOORMAN_ID = FLOORMAN_ID where FLOORMAN_ID = #{FLOORMAN_ID}
mapper.select: select BUILD_NO, FLOOR, FLOOR_MASTER_NAME, MASTER_TEL, CREATE_TIME, FLOORMAN_ID from FLOOR_MAN where FLOORMAN_ID = #{FLOORMAN_ID}
